member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Mvc.Configuration.UseRouteHandler(System.Func{System.Web.Routing.IRouteHandler})
member.summary: Specifies a function that returns an alternate route handler. By default, the route handler is the default MvcRouteHandler.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Mvc.Configuration.AddRoutesFromController``1
member.summary: Appends the routes from the specified controller type to the end of route collection.

member.name: M:AttributeRouting.Web.Mvc.Configuration.AddRoutesFromControllersOfType``1
member.summary: Appends the routes from all controllers that derive from the specified controller type to the route collection.

The constraint to apply to matched parameters

member.summary: The controller type applicable to this context.

member.name: P:AttributeRouting.Web.Mvc.Configuration.CurrentUICultureResolver
member.summary: This delegate returns the current UI culture name, which is used when constraining inbound routes by culture. The default delegate returns the CurrentUICulture name of the current thread.
